title.rendered: How to Set Up an Ecommerce Affiliate Marketing Program with Rick Magennis of Affiliate Program Management

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 29:52 — 27.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 29:52 — 27.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Rick Magennis – helps brands scale their business through “performance marketing” aka affiliate marketing (and set up or manage affiliate programs). We are still with Rick today to talk about how and where to start when you want an affiliate program for your product.

Check out his website: https://affiliateprogrammanagement.co

Get FREE access to their first event, Affiliate Management Expo HERE. It’s 20 sessions on all things affiliate program management brought to you by industry veterans. The code for free access is AMAZINGFBA

 

**As a special gift to the listeners of the podcast that are interested in starting an affiliate program Rick will do a 1-hour consultation session for free and then if they want me to set up their new program then He will do it for $500.**

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How to find out about your competitors in your Ecommerce space
  • How to have a strategy around commission level
  • How to pick the right tech platform for your business
  • How to   find affiliates
  • To figure out who to target
  • The mistakes with keeping partners engaged and motivated
